attributes.title: This app broke my phone!!!!
attributes.review: Had high hopes for donnie’s app but when I downloaded my phone immediately started glitching. Then every time I opened the app I noticed shady figures in pointy white hats were staring at me from outside my window!!! It’s like they knew a socialist was on their internet territory and came to defend their cult leader. 0/10 would recommend

attributes.title: I HAD TO GET A NEW PHONE!
attributes.review: I kid you not this app DESTROYED my phone! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!! I had bought a new iPhone a few weeks back and THE DAY I got this app my husband ran over my phone with the lawnmower on accident. I think my son left it out in the grass. NOW I HAVE TO BUY A NEW PHONE!! If I could turn back time I would’ve downloaded Candy Crush and my phone would still be in tact.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER MADE
attributes.review: This app does absolutely nothing, spreads fake news and supports homophobia, racism and more. It should not be in the app store and if I could rate it 0 stars I would. How come somebody so brainless and ignorant could rule a country it makes 0 sense they really want to keep this app but get rid of tiktok, Trump you messed with the wrong generation booboo, anyways stan Charli Damelio for clear skin✨✨✨✨

attributes.title: App needs serious help.
attributes.review:
Best hopes for anyone who has good reviews from this app. 

I tried it but the app made my phone glitch the whole time. I had to factory reset my phone. This phone was so slow while using it. I just hope you could get this fixed. Will not be using this app ever again.

attributes.title: ABSOLUTE TRASH
attributes.review: ✨💕👑 I cant even start to describe how horrible this app is. It glitches all the time 🤪no only does this app make me sick by just looking at the cover it also pays me physically to turn it on. so for those reasons alone I have left one star I do not recommend this app unless you’re going to give it one star thank you ✨🧚🙈

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is ridiculously slow and kicks u out if it sees u through the camera and tells you,you’re not white it’s also very glitchy,another thing is there is a big carrot on the apps background which I can’t go to the settings to remove it so please take this app off it’s terrible

attributes.title: Ugly orange 🍊🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.review: Do not get this app!!!! It will make you as ugly as the Cheeto puff president 🍊it’s horrible you will turn orange like an Oompa Loompa 👩‍🦲it also made my pet rug die I was taking it for a walk and the app was downloading and as soon as it downloaded my pet rug wouldn’t move 😔🤚🏼it was very heart breaking 💔 and now No animal wants to get near me because I download this app please do not get it 🐿😔

attributes.title: TERRIBLE 🤬🤬
attributes.review: Overall, this whole app is booty so I wouldn’t waste time and download it. Second, this app has many bugs that shouldn’t be fixed because this app is too booty to be fixed. I’m not just saying this because I don’t like trump but…i don’t like trump 😌🦋🧚🏽‍♀️😍✨! I hope you consider taking this booty app off of the App Store :) .

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: Don’t download it stole 200$ from me and after this app over 6 random people called me within an hour and when it says our President I only see and garbage can or and orange that’s it and when it was asking questions it was saying HORRIBLE things and was asking for my credit car number

attributes.title: i’m genuinely disappointed
attributes.review: don’t get this app unless you want your money stolen and spams. i was milking my cow until i get a notification thinking it was my pet fish that died tryna contact me that he’s watching me (rest in peace my baby bubbles) but i get a notification from this saying it has taken away my money from my pocket!!! this app can literally get hands on you and steal anything and now my toilet is missing and i’m pretty sure it’s this app!! a scam i tell you! please take this review serious we don’t want any more daily life things we use stolen!!! protect all items ✊🏻!
